TopicTitle: what kind of parts would you guys want? (beyond 0.20)

Articles.Content:
Karolus pointed out that space station modules would be useful for both applications and the ground ones would just need legs.

What if it was one part for both applications, with legs that extended like landing gear? you could keep them retracted on a space station and extend them on the planetary or moon surface for a base.

Different action groups for inflating the module and extending the landing gear?

I thing that very useful would be separate telescopic legs (nothing can be attached to inflatable part of the module) that will lock down when touch the ground (or adjust manually, whatever).

This mean, that we need to properly level only first module and then use rover (robotic "scissor lift" part would solve most lifting issues, where robotic arms couldn't do the job ) to place and dock every next module, deploy legs (witch stop after touch the ground providing easy auto-leveling) , let go and drive away.
I'd like an airbag landing system like the Mars Pathfinder mission used.

Androgynous docking port so you can dock with any docking ports and bigger solid rocket boosters

Edited May 24, 2013 by ouion
Smaller 2.5m rcs tank, and nuclear reactor

If this includes additional features as well, heres what I want.

Life Support Modules, with proper life support,

A Power generator that uses some sort of fuel, nuclear fuel, plutonium, liquid fuel, etc, etc

Proper and working Heatshield

Payload fairings!

Definitely more Space Station Modules

Parts that Compliment each other, and not make your vessel look like a mess (look for real life spacecrafts for reference)

Especially the following KSPX Parts:

Stratus-V Tanks

Rockomax 48-7S

Mk25-Radial Parachute

Adapters

And a 2.5m Hubmax Connector

I know it isn`t a part but I want the smoke and flames that come out the side of the launchpad when you launch. Also ice falling from the craft.

Also 300Kn NERVA, Large nuclear generator, F1B engine...

(Also everything everybody else said, science, hinges, base stuff, station stuff, parachutes for kerbals, resources, variable fuel tanks etc)

Wings with fuel tanks in them. Wider selection of jet engines and a part that would limit control surface movements so you would get same response for control inputs at all altitudes and smaller airplanes could have more reasonable roll rates.

I would like Triangle Structural Panel and more Wing Shapes.

After Burner Diamonds forming when going very fast with the Turbo Jet Engines.

Shock-waves When Breaking the Sound Barrier.

More Jet Engine Types.

Edited May 25, 2013 by KissSh0t

3 man cupola.

Better IVA views for the mk2 and 3 cockpits.

Farings for when they introduces the better aerodynamics

3M parts for extreme heavy lifting.
There's a bunch but one I would really like on my latest build is a reinforced truss. Basically a truss and an I-beam combined into one. Heavy but very strong.
Heatshields and Vertically placed struts
Stock parts for mapping and mining.
Anything that provides more goals in construction and missions: new station modules/resources, surface base components, mining equipment, functional scientific equipment for satellites, etc.

I would like to see detectors like JSD said. And tiny rover wheels for small moon buggies or even better small 2 seat rover folding itself.

And also 2 man capsule(already said) with high visibility for front with integrated docking port would be awesome.

Edited May 25, 2013 by EvilotionCR2
Frankly, I'd be happy with just a larger amount of adapters. It always bugged me that to go from medium to small I have to have the huge black cone thing.

Frankly, I'd be happy with just a larger amount of adapters. It always bugged me that to go from medium to small I have to have the huge black cone thing.

You can use the 1m-to-truss adapter. Not only is it more lightweight, it fits perfectly and looks better for non-atmospheric vessels.

I want station parts! More habitation modules. I also definitely want more parts under the "scientific" tab, like more antennas, and more scientific equipment. I also want a 2.5 m to large girder adapter.
What I'd like is a NERVA made to be radially mounted.
What I would like are wheels and suspension parts as components, so you could build your own purpose built landing gear to your own specs.
I want the rover wheels from the video.

I want:

Payload Fairings

Multi-Nozzle Engines

Tools to use during EVA

Station parts!

Life-Support (Optional)

Customisable parts

and Finite Supplies of Resources

Main one for me, just off the top of my head, is a small adapter, one to go from the standard 1m size to the "micro" probe size, the current adapters are huge, i'd like a short one like that rockomax-1m adapter, the flat/shorter one.

and all the habitation/science/robotics stuff mentioned earlier.

Science stuff, Damaged parts that can be repaired with kerbal duct tape. And fire/Craters when you crash your rocket.

Maybe resource leak too, like if you puncture a fuel tank, it will slowly leak until it is fixed.

Edited May 26, 2013 by ZedNova

Science stuff, Damaged parts that can be repaired with kerbal duct tape. And fire/Craters when you crash your rocket.

Maybe resource leak too, like it you puncture a fuel tank, it will slowly leak until it is fixed.

This ^ Would love that. Even simply dark spots where you crash, doesn't even need to be an actual crater.

I would like to see cargo bays for all size and shaped parts, along with mining and science equipment mentioned above
